examples: I agree with your assessment of the situation.
We need to agree on a plan before we start.
Concordo com sua avaliação da situação.
Precisamos concordar em um plano antes de começarmos.

suggested: Why did the cookie go to the doctor? Because it was feeling crumbly! (I agree, that was a bad joke)
The thought of not being able to agree with someone important in our lives can be disheartening.
It's frustrating when people don't want to listen or try to understand our point of view, even when we agree with them.
Did you know that agreeing with someone can actually strengthen the connection and trust in a relationship?
There's no specific smell associated with 'agree', but the scent of understanding and compromise can be comforting.
The physical sensation of nodding in agreement or shaking hands can be a sign of mutual respect.
Agreeing with someone can provide a sense of unity, cooperation, and harmony.
